abstract.para: Following sections describe known issues you may encounter while using DataCleaner Monitor. You will also find a workaround or tips how to fix the problem when such a solution exists.

section.title: Equally named metrics
section.para: Let's consider a job containing multiple analyzers of the same type which provide sets of equally named metrics.
When you want to create a timeline and select the same metrics, just from different metric groups, you will probably end up with a graph showing only one of those metrics.
The problem is that those names are used as unique identifiers which obviously does not work.
section.subtitle: Workaround
section.para: You can fix this problem in your job by providing unique names for all of your analyzers / components.
